name: Age that the allergy or intolerance resolved
publisher: Health Level Seven, Inc. - FHIR WG
description: The estimated patient age at which the allergy or intolerance resolved. Should be specified only if the status is resolved.

element.short: Age that the allergy or intolerance resolved
element.definition: The estimated patient age at which the allergy or intolerance resolved. Should be specified only if the status is resolved.
element.comments: Removed Date since it is hard to imagine knowing the date an allergy abated. The assertion date is already captured.

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition should be version specific.  This will ideally be the URI for the Resource Profile defining the extension, with the code for the extension after a #.

element.short: A duration (length of time) with a UCUM code
element.definition: There SHALL be a code if there is a value and it SHALL be an expression of time.  If system is present, it SHALL be UCUM.  If value is present, it SHALL be positive.
element.comments: The context of use may frequently define what kind of quantity this is and therefore what kind of units can be used. The context of use may also restrict the values for the comparator.

constraint.human: If a code for the unit is present, the system SHALL also be present
There SHALL be a code if there is a value and it SHALL be an expression of time.  If system is present, it SHALL be UCUM.  If value is present, it SHALL be positive.
constraint.xpath: (f:code or not(f:value)) and (not(exists(f:system)) or f:system/@value='http://unitsofmeasure.org') and not(contains(f:value/@value, '-'))

mapping.map: PQ, IVL<PQ>, MO, CO, depending on the values

element.short: Age that the allergy or intolerance resolved
element.definition: The estimated patient age at which the allergy or intolerance resolved. Should be specified only if the status is resolved.
element.comments: Removed Date since it is hard to imagine knowing the date an allergy abated. The assertion date is already captured.
